mapper.select: select sum(point) from studio_info where del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and user_id=#{userId} group by user_id
mapper.insert: insert into studio_info ( id, url, del_flag, create_time, user_id, lession_id, type )values( #{id}, #{url}, #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{lessionId}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM studio_info WHERE type = 1 AND lession_id = #{lessionId} AND del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

SELECT count(1) FROM studio_info WHERE type = 1 AND lession_id = #{lessionId} AND del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM studio_info WHERE type = 0 AND del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND lession_id = #{lessionId} GROUP BY user_id )

SELECT si.user_id as userId, li.id AS lessionId, li. NAME as `name`, si.create_time AS createTime, si.`comment` as comment, si.point as point, si.point_time as pointTime FROM studio_info si JOIN lession_info li ON li.id = si.lession_id WHERE si.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND li.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND si.create_time >#{createTime} AND si.user_id=#{userId} order by si.create_time desc limit 0, #{size}

SELECT u.id AS userId, u.realname AS userName, si.url AS studioUrl, si.point AS point FROM studio_info AS si JOIN `user` u ON u.id = si.user_id AND u.del_flag = si.del_flag JOIN lession_info li ON li.id = si.lession_id WHERE si.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND pointer IS NOT NULL AND li.id=#{lessionId} AND u.id=#{userId} ORDER BY point DESC, si.create_time ASC LIMIT 0,10

select *,(select count(1) from studio_info where pointer is not null and point > IFNULL(si.point,0) AND lession_id=#{lessionId} and del_flag =#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}) as ranking from studio_info si join lession_info li on li.id=si.lession_id where si.user_id =#{userId} AND si.lession_id=#{lessionId} AND si.del_flag=#{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
